name: 2 Heroes 1 Dungeon
description:
~ a game made in 49 hours by Crab Gang ~

A cursed dungeon prevents adventurers from entering unless it's a party of two. After weeks, another adventurer has finally replied to your advertisement asking for a partner. But just how reliable is this hero going to be?

Made in 49 hours 😔 for the Bonfire Jam! The theme was "You can't do it alone".

Controls:

WASD: Movement

E: Interact

Space: Attack

Shift: Skip dialogue

Mouse: Navigate menus

Sound effects created by artisticdude, MirceaKitsune, shelbyshark, and OwlishMedia.

Music created by remaxim.

Fog shader by Gonkee.

#bonfirejam
